#summary Dependencies of the project
This package is using the following components:
 * [http://www.knime.org/downloads/knime KNIME] 2.0.2 or above (The first [http://www.knime.org/introduction/screencasts screencast] helps you to install it.)
 * [http://labs.knime.org/ KNIME Labs]'s KNIME Distance Matrix Feature
 * [http://cran.r-project.org/mirrors.html R] 2.8.x ([InstallR  help to install and setup R])
 * [http://www.bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/cellHTS2.html CellHTS2 2.6.x] (recommends {{{locfit}}}) ([InstallCellHTS2 help to install and setup CellHTS2])
 * [http://www.rforge.net/Rserve/ Rserve] 0.5.2 or later ([InstallRserve help to install and setup Rserve])
 * [http://java.sun.com/javase/ Java SE 6] (SUN JRE 6 update 10 and above have very annoying UI problems with KNIME under MS Windows, Linux, so those are not recommended; the one is included with the KNIME installation is mostly OK, so you do not have to download anything.)
